channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- PostX – Gutenberg Blocks for Post Grid
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- PostX – Gutenberg Blocks for Post Grid

item.title: CVE-2021-24652|2024-08-03T19:35:20.368Z -- unknown -- postx%20%E2%80%93%20gutenberg%20blocks%20for%20post%20grid
item.description: The PostX – Gutenberg Blocks for Post Grid WordPress plugin before 2.4.10 performs incorrect checks before allowing any logged in user to perform some ajax based requests, allowing any user to modify, delete or add ultp_options values.

item.title: CVE-2021-24660|2024-08-03T19:35:20.414Z -- unknown -- postx%20%E2%80%93%20gutenberg%20blocks%20for%20post%20grid
item.description: The PostX – Gutenberg Blocks for Post Grid WordPress plugin before 2.4.10, with Saved Templates Addon enabled, allows users with a role as low as Contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks via the plugin's shortcode.

item.title: CVE-2021-24661|2024-08-03T19:42:16.109Z -- unknown -- postx%20%E2%80%93%20gutenberg%20blocks%20for%20post%20grid
item.description: The PostX – Gutenberg Blocks for Post Grid WordPress plugin before 2.4.10, with Saved Templates Addon enabled, allows users with Contributor roles or higher to read password-protected or private post contents the user is otherwise unable to read, given the post ID.

item.title: CVE-2021-24659|2024-08-03T19:35:20.408Z -- unknown -- postx%20%E2%80%93%20gutenberg%20blocks%20for%20post%20grid
item.description: The PostX – Gutenberg Blocks for Post Grid WordPress plugin before 2.4.10 allows users with a role as low as Contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks via the plugin's block.
